title: Anne of Green Gables
creator_credit: Kevin Sullivan, Ian McDougall and Sullivan Films
brief_description: Artistically filmed amidst the spectacular scenery of Prince Edward Island, Canada, this award winning movie follows the provocative life drama of Anne Shirley, an endearing orphan, from her struggles as an adolescent to her triumphs as a young woman. Based on the novel “Anne of Green Gables” by Lucy Maud Montgomery, it stars Megan Follows and Colleen Dewhurst.
